org.waag.histograph.graph

Class GraphMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waag.histograph.graph.GraphMethods

  • public class GraphMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing several static methods for basic Neo4j graph operations. All methods require an added GraphDatabaseService object that encapsulates the Neo4j graph, on which the operations are to be performed.
    Author:
    Rutger van Willigen, Bert Spaan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphMethods

        public GraphMethods()

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public static void addNode(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                    throws org.neo4j.graphdb.ConstraintViolationException
        Adds a node to the graph. Nodes have a uniqueness constraint on the 'hgid' property -- if a node with the same hgid was already present, the node is not added and a ConstraintViolationException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing all parameters to be added to the node. Commonly created by the InputReader class, returned with Task.getParams().
        Throws:
        org.neo4j.graphdb.ConstraintViolationException - Thrown if a node with the same hgid was already present.

      • updateNode

        public static void updateNode(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Updates an existing node in the graph, based on the hgid, which remains the same. All other properties are removed and replaced by the parameters in the params object.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing the hgid and all parameters to be added to the node. Commonly created by the InputReader class, returned with Task.getParams().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if no node with this hgid was present in the graph.

      • deleteNode

        public static void deleteNode(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Removes a node and all its associated relationships from the graph. The node is found using the hgid found in the parameters map.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing the hgid of the node that is to be removed. All other parameters are ignored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if no node with this hgid was present in the graph.

      • getNodesFromParams

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Node[] getNodesFromParams(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                                          java.lang.String hgidOrURI)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Looks up all nodes given a URI or hgid parameter. First, nodes are looked up by URI -- if no nodes are found, then a node is looked up by the hgid.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        hgidOrURI - A parameter representing either a URI or a hgid.
        Returns:
        An array of the nodes found. If no nodes are found, null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if multiple nodes are found when searching by hgid. This should not happen due to the uniqueness constraint.

      • addRelation

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship[] addRelation(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates one or more relationships between nodes, depending on the hgid or URI parameter that are passed. First, all start and end nodes are looked up (possibly more than one if URI's are passed), and if the specified relationship between these nodes do not exist, they are created and returned.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing the parameters for the relationships that are to be created. Typically created by the InputReader class, returned with Task.getParams().
        Returns:
        An array containing all newly created Relationships, or null if no relations were created
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if no nodes are found based on the given hgid's or URI's.

      • updateRelation

        public static void updateRelation(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Updates a relationship. Currently not supported -- an IOException is always thrown.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing the parameters for the relationship that is to be updated. Typically created by the InputReader class, returned with Task.getParams().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Always thrown as updating relationships is not supported. Remove and add a new relationship instead.

      • deleteRelation

        public static void deleteRelation(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes one or more relationships, based on a relationship label and node identifiers (either hgid or URI).
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        params - A map containing the parameters for the relationship that is to be deleted. Typically created by the InputReader class, returned with Task.getParams().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if no nodes are present associated with the provided hgid or URI.

      • getNodeByHgid

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Node getNodeByHgid(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                                   java.lang.String hgid)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a node given a hgid, or null if no nodes with this hgid are found.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        hgid - The hgid to search for.
        Returns:
        The node associated with the specified hgid, or null if no such node is found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if multiple nodes with the specified hgid are found. This should not happen due to the uniqueness constraint.

      • nodeExistsByHgid

        public static boolean nodeExistsByHgid(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                       java.lang.String hgid)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether a node with a specified hgid exists.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        hgid - The hgid to search for.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating if a node with the specified hgid exists in the graph.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if multiple nodes with the specified hgid exist.

      • nodeAbsentByHgid

        public static boolean nodeAbsentByHgid(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                       java.lang.String hgid)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether a node with a specified hgid does NOT exist in the graph.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        hgid - The hgid to search for.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating if a node with the specified hgid is absent in the graph.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if multiple nodes with the specified hgid exist.

      • getNodesByURI

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Node[] getNodesByURI(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                                     java.lang.String uri)
        Find all nodes containing a specified URI.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        uri - The URI to search for.
        Returns:
        An array of nodes containing this URI, or null if no such nodes are present.

      • getRelation

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship getRelation(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                                         org.neo4j.graphdb.Node fromNode,
                                                         org.neo4j.graphdb.Node toNode,
                                                         org.neo4j.graphdb.RelationshipType type)
        Finds and returns a relationship based on two nodes and a relationship type.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        fromNode - The start node object of the relationship
        toNode - The end node object of the relationship
        type - The relationship type of this relationship
        Returns:
        The relationship associated with the parameters, or null if this relationship does not exist.

      • relationExists

        public static boolean relationExists(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.Node fromNode,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.Node toNode,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.RelationshipType type)
        Checks whether a relationship exists in the graph.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        fromNode - The start node object of the relationship
        toNode - The end node object of the relationship
        type - The relationship type of this relationship
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating whether this relationship exists in the graph.

      • relationAbsent

        public static boolean relationAbsent(org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService db,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.Node fromNode,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.Node toNode,
                                     org.neo4j.graphdb.RelationshipType type)
        Checks whether a relationship is absent in the graph.
        Parameters:
        db - The Neo4j graph object
        fromNode - The start node object of the relationship
        toNode - The end node object of the relationship
        type - The relationship type of this relationship
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating whether this relationship is absent in the graph.
